backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing orders with CRUD, payment confirmation, and status timeline tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and configs.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the Android directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor config defining app metadata, web directory, server scheme, and Android build options.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and dark/light theme CSS variable definitions.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA manifest, icons, theme metadata, and script mount point.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Ads.txt declaration for authorized Google AdSense publisher.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display settings.
frontend/README-android-apk.md: Instructions for building the Android APK using Capacitor and Android Studio.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling navigation, ordering workflow, admin mode, APK logic, ads injection, and use of founder photo assets.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminApkDo: Button that checks availability of the admin APK and triggers download or shows an unavailable alert.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard displaying order stats, filters, order list, order detail view, APK download, and logout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Admin login modal requiring a validated 4‑digit PIN to grant dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderDetai: Sheet view showing full order details with status update controls and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersFilt: Renders admin UI filters for orders, allowing selection of payment status and order status.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersTabl: Displays a table of orders with formatted fields, status badges, payment info, and a view-action button.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsHeadInjec: Injects the ad provider head script at runtime when ads are enabled; renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSlot.tsx: Mounts and unmounts a configured ad slot snippet into a container when ads are enabled.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdsSettingsP: Owner-facing panel to configure AdSense settings, validate input, and save to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: UI for selecting plate type and quantity, validating minimum order, and submitting createOrder via React Query.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx: Renders a circular owner photo with size variants and a fallback image on load error.
frontend/src/components/PostOrderConfirm: Displays a modal for post-order payment actions, UPI payment handling, WhatsApp links, and payment confirmation submission.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Shows a timed promotional popup encouraging users to order, dismissible and stored per session.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Provides a simple modal with content text, optional WhatsApp link actions, and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ads config structure and helpers to generate AdSense head and slot snippets.
frontend/src/config/apk.ts: Provides static configuration for customer and admin APK download details.
frontend/src/config/ownerPhotos.ts: Exports URLs for founder images at multiple sizes.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Defines business UPI ID, delivery charge, and business name for payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Tracks admin authorization state based on URL hash and updates reactively.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all orders for admin dashboard when authorization and actor are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdsConfig.ts: Computes runtime ads configuration from settings, environment, and admin mode with dynamic snippet generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation for creating orders via the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
React Query mutation hook that updates an order’s status via the backend actor and refreshes admin order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePaymentConfi: Mutation hook to submit payment confirmation details to the backend and invalidate related order queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode theme, base styles, and simple animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccess.ts: Utility functions for managing admin PIN tokens via the URL hash, including validation and hash manipulation.
frontend/src/lib/ads.ts: Utilities for safely injecting ad provider scripts and mounting or unmounting ad slot snippets in the DOM.
frontend/src/lib/adsenseSnippet.ts: Parses pasted AdSense snippets to extract and validate a ca‑pub client ID.
frontend/src/lib/adsOwnerSettings.ts: Manages AdSense owner settings in localStorage with validation and change-event subscription.
frontend/src/lib/apkAvailability.ts: Checks availability and triggers downloads for customer and admin APK files based on configured URLs.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Defines minimum order rules and provides helper messages for validating order quantity.
frontend/src/lib/runtimeEnvironment.ts: Detects whether the app is running in a Capacitor native environment or a standard web environment.
frontend/src/lib/upi.ts: Provides utilities to build UPI deep links, open various UPI apps, and copy UPI links to the clipboard.
frontend/src/lib/vpaValidation.ts: Validates UPI VPAs against basic rules and placeholder patterns and provides a generic error message.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links for order, payment, and screenshot messages and provides helpers to open them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and features for adding a founder photo to the site.
